import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; export default function PlaceorderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push("/payment"); } const toPrice = (num) =>Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.items return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} ,{cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}

  • Order Summary

  • Items
    ${cart.itemsPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Shipping
    ${cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Tax
    ${cart.taxPrice.toFixed(2)}
  • Order Total
    ${cart.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
); }
